short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync Basecamp Card Tables to the Clockify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing ClockCamp, the ultimate Chrome extension for Basecamp users! Enhance your project management experience by seamlessly syncing Basecamp's Card Tables with Clockify. While Basecamp excels at organizing projects, tasks, statuses, and workflows, it lacks built-in time tracking. Clockify, a free and powerful tool, fills this gap by tracking time spent on tasks. With ClockCamp, every task in your Card Tables is automatically synced to Clockify, allowing for effortless time tracking and improved project management. Simplify your workflow and maximize productivity with ClockCamp!
